item.title: emily add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "I tell you, we are here on Earth to fart around, and don't let anybody tell you different." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: emily add a quote by A.A. Milne
emily add a quote by Bashō Matsuo
item.description: "Wake butterfly – It’s late, we’ve miles to go together" -- Bashō Matsuo

item.title: emily add a quote by William Shakespear
item.description: "There is nothing either good or bad, but thinking makes it so." -- William Shakespear

item.title: emily add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: emily add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "I became insane, with long intervals of horrible sanity." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: emily add a quote by Andre Berthiaume
item.description: "We all wear masks, and the time comes when we cannot remove them without removing some of our own skin." -- Andre Berthiaume
